campaign.story:
Welcome
I have designed these models for anyone who wants to 3D print some Sci-Fi gaming pieces. I have spent a lot of time modeling these so I hope you enjoy these files. With these files you get a collection of Sci-Fi tanks and vehicles that you can use in whatever tabletop game you choose. All of these models are supplied as 3D printable STL files. 
After modeling these tanks I have decided to bring them to Kickstarter. By pledging to this Kickstarter you get these STL files (plus stretch goals) ready to be played for your tabletop games. 
Thank you for supporting this campaign and bringing it to success!
Scales
These STL files are dilievered in the 15mm, 28mm, and 32mm scales. That being said you can scale these files up or down to any scale you wish. 
About
In this Kickstarter there is included 10 tanks of varying types. Each tank has separate printable peices when needed so the printing process is more smooth. As soon as the Kickstarter has ended and the payments are processed you will receive these 3D printable STL files. 
Alpheratz Medium Tank
Alpheratz Medium Tank
Alpheratz Medium Tank
Mirach Heavy Tank
Mirach Heavy Tank
Mirach Heavy Tank
Adhil Tracked Mine Tank
Adhil Tracked Mine Tank
Al Bali Large Missile Tank
Al Bali Large Missile Tank
Al Bali Large Missile Tank
Almach Light Tank
Almach Light Tank
Almach Light Tank
Ancha Medium Missile Tank
Ancha Medium Missile Tank
Ancha Medium Missile Tank
Antlia Firefighter Tank
Antlia Firefighter Tank
Antlia Firefighter Tank
Apus Flame Thrower Tank
Apus Flame Thrower Tank
Apus Flame Thrower Tank
Sadachbia Tank Destroyer
Sadachbia Tank Destroyer
Sadachbia Tank Destroyer
Sadal Melik Howitzer Tank
Sadal Melik Howitzer Tank
Sadal Melik Howitzer Tank
Stretch Goals
Sci-Fi War Tanks + Previous Sci-Fi Packs
Look for the pledge level where you receive the tanks and stretch goals as digital STL files for 3D printing plus all previous Sci-Fi Packs!
TERMS AND CONDITIONS 
When you contribute to this campaign you will receive STL files for the models you see here. The files will be delivered after the Kickstarter ends and the payments are processed. You can print these files for your personal use, but you may not sell the printed items for profit or distribute the digital 3D models/files to other parties. If you buy a license then you can print out the pieces and sell them for profit but you can not sell the 3D digital models/files.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This project is mostly risk free as all of the files for the project are complete and ready to go. I hope to unlock more models but with the stretch goal models they are already made as well.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Cute wooden models bringing nostalgia and passion for retro aesthetics.
Most of you know our Time for Machine project for our complicated metal models. However, this time we are presenting heart-warming, pleasant, and easy-to-assemble plywood models.

Back in 2012, I started my way with inventing wooden mechanical construction sets. At first, my project was unique and the only one in the world. Then, some alternatives started to appear in different parts of the world. That was how I unexpectedly found a new niche for inventors. Now, such toys are produced by more than 10 companies around the world. After that, I went through some changes in my personal life and business. In 2017, I had to start over, and created metal mechanical models. It was not easy but thanks to your support on Kickstarter, I was able to develop this project. Today my Time for Machine team and I decided to go back to the basics and created a series of models called The iconic series. 
Denis Okhrimenko, the founder and СЕО of Time for Machine.
Inspired by sweet retro nostalgia, hippie romance, and pure technical simplicity, these construction sets became our chance to feel the soft touch of history. All the models are quite easy to assemble, perfect for every age. Every set contains plywood parts, additional colored plastic parts, manuals, and a piece of wax to make all the rotating parts move smoothly.

Open stretch goal:
Radio-controlled tanks DSP-1 and DSP-2.
Meet our tanks, a real miracle of military hardware! This radio-controlled fantasy tank is inspired by the very first models of tanks. It comes with 3 mini-figures of soldiers and a couple of details: obstacles and entourage elements. This model runs on 4 AA batteries. The control panel is on the special board in a plywood case. You don't have to solder the electronics, you just need to assemble the tank, inserting the board and connecting the wires.
  This is a unique tracked vehicle made of plywood and inspired by diesel punk aesthetics. Both right and left tracks can move. This tank is almost omnipotent: it can overcome obstacles, turn around and move back and forth. That’s entertainment!

Tank DSP-1

Tank DSP-2
 Video with Tanks:
PLAY


PLAY

Rewards with Tanks:
We want you to feel the heart and soul of these models, 
revisiting your childhood with its joy and precious memories. This series is a perfect combination of both elegance of the good old days and today’s minimalistic design. Laconic and stylish, every model is a great pleasure to admire. Trying to catch the vibe of the retro epoch we decided on a bold experiment with style, colors, and mechanics.
Lord of the Rails
Every time we travel by train, some elusive mystery hangs in the air. So this time we decided to give you a pinch of magic and create something extraordinary. Gracious and fabulous, our Lord of the Rails is destined for marvelous adventures. With this train, it’s so easy to travel the world and the seven seas, chasing your crystal dreams.
The locomotive has an electric motor. 4 AA batteries are attached under the bottom. A small control board comes with the kit. This board contains an on/off switch and two pairs of LEDs which glow on the transparent acrylic body parts. The assembled model has a metal lever on top. This lever allows the train to move forward and backward. Also, the locomotive has a plywood switch with two speed modes: slow and fast. It moves the gear inside the mechanism and activates one of these modes. On the back and front parts of the locomotive, there is a convenient mechanism for automatic coupling with the car. You can fasten the carriage with just one move. To unhook it, you need to press the side wings on the hitch-mechanism.
The locomotive comes with one carriage with the same colored wheels and a small part of rails for a carriage and a locomotive.
To make the train move on a full-fledged railroad, you will need a complete set of rails, which we have prepared as a separate model. Nevertheless, the train can move perfectly well without these rails. For this purpose, on the lower part of the locomotive and the car there are special locks for wheel bogies. You can lock the rotating wheelsets squarely or in reverse and make the locomotive move forward or in a circle on the floor.
PLAY

LockBox
Our LockBox was born to be a good home for your secrets and memories. It may become a real challenge for everyone who is hungry for your mysteries. With this model, all your private stories, precious, intimate, and fragile, will be in good hands, so now you can feel relieved and rely on it.
This wooden safe will bring life and vibrance to every interior, enchanting everyone with the radiant beauty of its details: red, yellow, or blue colors make this model just adorable.
Raging Bull
Filled with some wild beauty, our Raging Bull is a real legend in the world of sport cars. It’s so tempting to put your fears aside, seize the day, and disappear into the night. Driving crazy fast, breaking the speed of light, you will always feel its passionate devotion. Together, you will be gorgeous and invincible.
This wooden cowboy definitely knows how to win a good fight without hurting not a hair on your head! And moreover, it’s illegally handsome with its bright color accents: red, yellow, or blue.
Polish Legend
Embodying luxury and refined taste, Polish Legend knows the deepest desires of every car-connoisseur. This car inspires you to take a risk and go for the adventure of your dreams looking for hippie romance and the peace of mind. With this construction set, you can forget about time and plunge into another world, full of beauty and perfection. We were trying to keep the details simple and minimalistic in order not to distract your attention from bright colorful accents.
Watching its wheels move, discovering its mechanical secrets — this is all about good vibes and tranquility. This construction set is passionate and open-hearted, with its colorful plastic wheels and an opening hood and trunk. You can even put a Lego Minifigure on the passenger seat. For this purpose, we added special probes on the seats. This unexpected trick will make your car even more charming and revive the real Polish Legend.
* Minifigures are not included.
Hot Rod
This car is brutal and charismatic, and danger is its middle name! Our Hot Rod really knows how to divide and conquer. Every part of this model is full of both elegance and glory. It may look like a rebel, bad to the bone but the truth is that deep inside it’s kind, warm, and affectionate.
This model has a beautiful body and an amazing soul and comes with enjoyable red, yellow, or blue details. You can also put a Lego Minifigure on the passenger seat. For this purpose, we added special probes on the seats. This will add some personal identity and charisma to your car.
* Minifigures are not included.
Dream Van
All the sweet dreams come to an end. Well, fortunately, our Dream Van won’t disappear in the beams of the morning sun. Inspired by the Hippie Era, this car is light, airy, and carefree. Driving it is like listening to the music of freedom. This model is hard to resist and easy to assemble for every age. Laconic and stylish, Dream Van is full of retro nostalgia, playful colorful accents, and innocent tricks: cute plastic bands and springs.
The clockwork is hidden in the model’s back luggage compartment so you can open it up and see the finest details of the mechanism. Also, Dream Van has colorful plastic wheels: red, green, or blue. This invasion of color will take your breath away! You can even put three Lego Minifigures* inside the car. For this purpose, we added special probes: one on the driving seat and two on passenger seats. With this Lego-team, your car will look like a party bus from the 60s.
* Minifigures are not included.
Choose your reward:

More technical information:
The prototypes of these machines were not very technically complicated. We can say that our kits are quite easy to assemble too. Inside you will find plywood parts as well as additional colored plastic parts, instructions and a piece of wax to lubricate the rotating parts for smooth glide.
The clockwork is arranged in the body of each toy. For example, Polish Legend has it hidden under the hood, and Dream Van’s moving mechanism is mounted vertically in the back luggage compartment.
The wooden models have rack-and-pinion steering installed. Wheels can be turned and oriented in opposite directions so that the mechanical model will seamlessly turn during the race.
Choosing the style of cars and the era of these models, we were nostalgic for the second half of the 20th century, the time of hippies and the heyday of local car manufacturing. It was a time of iconic cars for an entire generation.
It was a romantic time when design bureaus created cars to meet people's needs rather than to fight for market shares. People endorsed this approach and chose the vehicles as a means of expressing themselves and their ideas.


As a final touch, we added the possibility to put a mini-figure on the car seat. For this purpose, there are special elements on the plywood seat to secure the figurine. (Attention! Lego figure is not included)

Choose your model and your colour from our wooden DIY kits.
Please help bring our creative project to life.
We promise that we will do everything in our power to execute this campaign to the best of our ability and on time.
The Team:
Watch a short video about our friendly team of engineers, designers and programmers, who work to create different models from metal, plywood, and models with electronic components.
PLAY


We are always looking forward to your reaction to our new developments, and we are very pleased when our designers bring you joy and you leave good feedback on websites. We try to improve new models and fix the defects of previous models that you found. Thanks to you, we've made adjustments to the instructions and changed some units and assembly methods in new developments. In all new models, the spring will be delivered in a ready-made closed drum for ease of assembly, and the same changes will be made in previous mechanisms.
We're introducing new components such as bearings, rubber and eco-leather parts, more durable packaging, and updated, more user-friendly instructions with multi-language translations. We are also creating electronic models, some of which will be presented this year. During development, we keep thinking about whether you will like it and whether you will enjoy it.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While we realize the challenges associated with a Kickstarter campaign, we also possess all the necessary capabilities to produce and deliver our models. What we have:

1) Our own manufacturing facilities with increased output and many years of experience in business and project management. We are confident in our ability to produce these beautiful and unique model kits for everyone who supports us in the campaign!

2) We have a detailed plan how to proceed after the end of the project.

3) Our company’s strategy is based on our long-lasting passion for designing unique, creative models and bringing joy to people all around the world.

With the support of Kickstarter – your support – we can breathe life into these interactive models and bring joy and beauty to people all around the world!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
First of all, thank you very much for everything. Many of you have been supporting our company for years. We are grateful to each of you for your comments, feedback, and support.
We are happy to inform you that all the models, except tanks, have already been sent. They should be shipped in September. But we are trying our best to start shipping in August.

Hi guys!
Want to hear good news? We started sending all models in all colors, except tanks. But we will keep you posted! Everyone from our team is trying to do their best so that you get your models as soon as possible!
Truly yours,
The Time for Machine

updates.update_userinfo: Choo-choo! The Lord of the Rails is coming!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
Today we have started sending to all those who are waiting for the Lord of the Rails + Rails. Also Lock Boxes, Polish Legends and Dream Vans in all colors!

Thank you for staying with us.

Hi! It's Time for Machine! We know you are eagerly waiting for your pledges of joy to arrive. We'd like to tell you once again how important is your support and to thank you. Today we have decided that the world needs some Time for Machine magic. Just look how we prepare our fantastic plywood models for Kickstarter, listening to their voices. Pretty soon, we’ll hear this music together!

Truly yours,

updates.update_userinfo: Dream Vans, Polish Legends and more!
updates.update_content:
Hello guys! 
On the 17-18th of May we will send Dream Vans and Polish Legends in blue color, and also to all those who have ordered Lock Boxes,  the set of Dream Vans and Polish Legends of all colors. 
On the 20 -21th of May we send Lord of the Rails + Rails set, also Dream Vans, Polish Legends and Lock Boxes.

Dear backers, the shipments have begun. We’ve already sent stylish Dream Van with red wheels to backers who have chosen this model. 
And it is just the begging! We will keep you posted.

Thank you for staying with us.

Hello everybody! 
Dear backers, on Sunday the 10th of April the BackerKit survey ends. After that, it will be no longer possible to change personal information. There are few days to check everything, your current address, phone number and name.  
Almost everything is ready. All models, except for the tank and the train, have already been cut, and are waiting for more rubber for the wheels.

Thanks to everyone who filled out the BackerKit survey, and these are 101 out of 122 people.  All who did not have the opportunity, please fill in as soon as possible. If you cannot find your survey link, please contact us here or at support@timeformachine.com.
Thanks for everyone, who has decided to purchase add-ons. We will charge cards on Wednesday. 
Thank you in advance once more. You helped to bring this project to life.

Soon, you’ll receive an email from us with a special link to your BackerKit survey.  5% of backers will receive the survey within the next 48 hours,  and the remaining surveys will be sent immediately after. It’s important to respond to your survey as quickly as you can since we need this information to fulfill your rewards.
You don’t need to create a BackerKit account to fill out your survey. When you receive the email with the survey, click the survey link to respond. Answer the questions about your reward preferences, provide shipping information, and purchase add-on items if you like. You don’t have access to this survey link yet, but it will be available soon via email!

Hi everyone!
Thanks once again to all of you.
We have good news! Most of the plywood plates are already cut, and we are waiting for the production of some plastic parts and packaging. We will fulfill our obligations as soon as possible.
You will get the Backerkit survey in the beginning of next week.

While you are waiting for more production updates, let us introduce our friends from JazzWood. They are amazing!

campaign.story:
Welcome to our first Kickstarter! The aim of this Kickstarter is to launch the Tiger Tanks Pack by Miniature Tanks Company. These tanks are for 1:100 (15mm) and 1:144 (12mm) wargaming scales. This Tiger Tanks Pack will eventually be one of a family of miniature collections from Miniature Tanks Company. This Kickstarter will help bring this vision to reality, help deliver these tanks to you, and help fund further miniature tanks and vehicles. 
The goal of Miniature Tanks Company is to create a collection of World War Two miniature equipment at affordable prices so you can build your collections quicker. The products from Miniature Tanks Company are both in 1:100 (15mm) and 1:144 (12mm) scales specially produced for wargaming purposes. 
For this Kickstarter I hope to introduce the entire range of Tiger tanks that were used during the war. Our miniature gaming models are 3D printed with fine detail on filament based printers that help keep material costs to a minimum. Our aim is to fill the void that was for so long a gap in the market where miniature tanks can be bought for affordable prices.
The Tiger 1 gave the German Army its first armoured fighting vehicle that mounted the 8.8 cm KwK 36 gun. The tank was given its nickname "Tiger" by Ferdinand Porsche, and the Roman numeral was added after the later Tiger 2 entered production.
The successor of Tiger 1, Tiger 2 sported the thick armor of Tiger 1 with the sloped armor of Panther. The Tiger 2 was issued to heavy tank battalions of the Army and the Waffen-SS.
The pricing is simple, over on the right is different reward levels. You can choose your pledge level and that will determine how many tokens you get.
Each tank that is 1:144 (12mm) scale will cost 2 tokens. Likewise, each tank that is 1:100 (15mm) scale will cost 4 tokens. It doesn't matter if you're ordering a Tiger 1 or a Tiger 2 or any of their variants, the scale determines the price... 2 tokens for the smaller scale 4 tokens for the larger scale. 
For a limited time, exclusive to this Kickstarter, these tanks are offered at this cheap of a price. On top of that, the wholesale deals can't be found anywhere else. 
Price is calculated based on printing time, filament used factoring in cost and markup, electricity used at 0.09 cents per kWh, print preparation and post processing labor cost time, and Kickstarters's fees.
The following shipping rates apply to all packages from the smallest orders to the largest. 
Shipping prices in USD. All rewards include SHIPPING WITH TRACKING numbers.
Find us on these sites or follow us by email.
www.miniaturetanks.com
3D Printed in the USA With Filament That Was Made in the USA
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every project has its own risks and challenges. The risk or challenge rather with this project is if there will be a large amount of orders the production lead times will naturally go up. However, if this was the case I expect to fix this delay by buying more printers to meet up with demand. 

I have chosen 3D printers because of the scalability and their ability to print anything so I can print any tank in the future. While this is my first Kickstarter, future ones will carry less challenges as I get my print farm established. Thank you for helping bring this project to life!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Sustainable materials
We use PLA filament by Push Plastic that is made in the USA. PLA is made from organic material and is the most commonly used filament for FDM printers. PLA is what’s known as a bioplastic as it’s a product of renewable organic material such as dextrose from sugarcane and cornstarch from maize. With this composition, PLA is environmentally safer. Unlike petroleum-based plastics, when PLA does decompose, it degrades to completely non-toxic products.
Environmentally friendly factories
PLA comes in plastic spools thus so when we have used a spool up we discard the plastic spool in our local plastic recycling center. Also, when we remove supports and whatever other excess garbage we generate from production we discard this also in the recycling center. 

We need electricity to power these printers obviously, but thankfully in Washington state where we are located, the electricity is the nations leading renewable source of electricity with four-fifths of the state's electricity generation originating from renewable energy.

campaign.story:
MENTIONED IN:

Meet Solo V2, from the team that brought you the first open source FIDO2 security key right here on Kickstarter!
You may not know until it is too late, and because security solutions are often expensive, all you can do is hope. But that doesn't need to be the case. 

You may be an army of one, but you can very easily protect yourself from a compromised account by employing a Solo V2 security key. 
Solo V2 Series USB-A & USB-C

Portable
Take Solo V2 with you. It fits on your key chain, providing you with additional security, wherever you go. 
Easy to Use
No need to install any software. You can use your V2 immediately. 

Solo V2 greatly reduces the risk of security breaches, as over 80% of all breaches are caused by passwords compromised through phishing email attacks. 
Preventing breaches can save the average corporation millions of dollars. Eliminating phishing can save you from major headaches and personal security concerns.
Solo V2 is a complete redesign of our original FIDO2 security key. 
The hardware is more physically robust
NFC performance is increased and uses a brand new microcontroller by NXP with enhanced security features. 
The firmware has been rewritten in Rust to be more modular/reusable by the community and to reduce the attack surface. 
Our goal with Solo V2 is to harden physical security of the device itself while providing all the protections that come with 2FA or passwordless login.
To use Solo V2, it's as easy as 1, 2, 3...

1) Log onto the website you desire to register your Solo V2 on and go to security settings. 
2) Typically, there is an option for enabling 2FA. In that selection, there will be an option to add a security key. Click on that, and follow the instructions to register the key. 
3) Once registered, next time you log in to your account the interface will request you to insert the security key and touch the button to authenticate.

FIDO2/WebAuthn are supported for two-factor authentication by all major applications including Google, Facebook, Dropbox, Okta, Duo and for passwordless login on Microsoft accounts and Windows Logon.
Why is V2 better?

● Reversible connector for both USB-A and USB-C. Solo V2 will be providing the first ever reversible USB-A connector. This will enable inserting the key into a USB Port and being able to decide what side you want to face up. This fixes the problem of having a key be oriented with the LED light not facing the operator.

● Touch Buttons. This a change from our original Solo key, which required a button to be depressed in order to activate. Depressing the button can cause physical stress and be awkward depending on where the key is inserted. The touch buttons remove the stress and allow for easier activation. 

● Industry leading NFC functionality. Innovative antenna design has resulted in Solo V2 crushing the the original Solo key with significant performance, improving on the range and field strength. 

● Robust construction. Solo V2 was designed to strengthen the weak points that naturally occurs at the base of the USB connector and the PCB. Creating a hard robust exterior shell that has a cavity for the circuitry to sit in has additionally created an opportunity to seal in the circuitry with an epoxy that protects the circuitry from the environment. Result: a very strong key that is water resistant. 

● Solo V2 supports firmware upgrade. One of the big challenges for security keys is that most devices are not updatable, causing the user to run the risk of their gear being superseded. With Solo V2, users and enterprise customers can commit to our authenticator knowing that they will have access and benefit from the improvements we make to the firmware down the road.
Our Solo keys work seamlessly on many services including: Google, Facebook, Twitter, Dropbox, Github, and many more. 

Because Solo supports the new FIDO2 standard, you get the strongest, most secure login with protection against phishing, account takeover, and other online attacks. And it's incredibly easy to use and consistent across all sites: when you login, after username and password, you plug Solo in your computer and just tap it to get access. Frankly, this is more convenient than typing OTP codes, besides being safer.

Even if you only secure your email (Gmail, Outlook, Fastmail) all other sites that have email-based password recovery, or use Google Login (or Facebook Login) become more secure.

Like it's predecessor, Solo V2 comes with a colored, sleek (and grippy!) silicone case, that you can match with your style, and even change to fit your mood. 

Solo V2 boasts:
3 touch buttons
Fully reversible connectors 
Multi-color LED for login indications 
Epoxy encapsulated electronics. 
Also, there's no battery... so it's always available and ready!
Always up-to-date
We believe that software must be up-to-date to be secure. Like laptops and mobile phones, security keys are adding more and more functionality, and therefore won't be exempt from bugs and vulnerabilities. Since our very first model, all of our keys support signed firmware updates. Each device can only update to the latest firmware that has been securely signed by SoloKeys.
Strong NFC and Reversible USB
Solo was the first security key on the market with NFC + USB-C. We redesigned the v2 series from the ground up, delivering greatly improved NFC performance. Also, both the USB-A and USB-C are reversible. That's right, the first reversible USB-A on the market.  Your Solo V2 USB-A will always be right side up!
Early prototype.


Robust and Water-Resistant
One major requirement for v2 series was durability and we made one of the most robust keys on the market.
Components are assembled on a module, inserted in a cavity and sealed with a layer of epoxy. This makes the keys water proof and tamper resistant.
Trusted authentication leader
SoloKeys is the first company to implement U2F and FIDO2 in the open. Our hardware and firmware are open source, verifiable and FIDO2 certified.

Made with a unique novel PCB construction that has been developed & perfected by SoloKeys.
Hard, robust exterior shell that collects inputs (USB, buttons, NFC).
An internal PCB that contains all the sensitive circuits and secure microcontroller.
The internal PCB is placed inside the external PCB & sealed shut using transparent epoxy.

Materials
 Matte Black Carbon Fiber FR4 encapsulation
 Transparent Epoxy encapsulation
 Gold Plated buttons and pads.
 High grade tensile Silicone cases 



Our manufacturing partners are a small family run business in the Emilia-Romagna region of North Italy.  This not only makes for great team getaways, but it also makes for a strong security story.
Our team with a couple of the factory owners.  We're holding our very first Solo models created back in 2018.
Since then, we've made a number of changes to the manufacturing process to bring you Solo V2.  Now, the circuitry is placed on a tiny PCB, called the module PCB.
These module PCBs are then placed into a second PCB called a cavity PCB.  This construction provides a much higher level of durability, flush profile, side capacitive touch buttons, and a strong NFC antenna.
Custom made pogo pin jig used for pressing module PCBs into the cavity PCBs while in the oven.
After everything is tested and programmed, the electronics cavity is permanently sealed with clear epoxy.  This provides durability, waterproofing, and tamper resistance for the keys.  Here is a demo of our glue dispensing being set up.

Easy to deploy. Solo doesn't require any software installation, it works out of the box on most browsers, operating systems and devices. It works great with GSuite, Okta, Duo and anything that supports WebAuthn/FIDO2.
Easy to use. It takes just one tap to authenticate. And we even made the USB-A plug reversible!
Protects against phishing and account takeover. Google reported 0 successful phishing attacks since they deployed security keys for 2FA. Security keys are particularly affordable if you have a large number of contractors that you need to authenticate.
Robust, water (and coffee) proof. We redesigned the hardware from the ground up to be incredibly robust and we sealed the components in epoxy to make it waterproof. Don't wash it, but don't worry about coffee spilling on it.
Secure upgrade. Unlike any other FIDO2 security key in the market, Solo supports secure firmware upgrade. Firmware upgrade is NOT automatic, it requires explicit user action, and you can only upgrade to an officially released SoloKeys signed firmware, not an arbitrary one. In case of security bugs, the upgrade process is secure and much cheaper than physically replacing all your security keys.
Open source. Your security / SRE teams and in general all the nerds in your company are going to love it! Want to make a surprise? Let us know and we can make custom cases for your team (minimum quantity: 40 devices).
PIV. For advanced authentication needs where WebAuthn does not cut it, an integral part of our strategy is the PIV (FIPS 201) companion app included with every key. Plug and play on Windows, easy OpenSC install on macOS and Linux.  Additionally, each device comes with both a P256 and Ed25519 attestation certificate, unique for the device, signed by our root CA during manufacture, and able to further attest PIV keys as generated on device.
For orders of 40 keys or more and for personalized cases please contact us at sales@solokeys.com.
We also sell a developer, non-locked version of our keys that is the same hardware, and can be updated/programmed with any firmware. We call it Solo Hacker.
You will be able to pre-order Solo Hacker from our website solokeys.com and we'll ask if you want a reprogrammable key in a survey at the end of the campaign. 
Solo Hacker - developer version sold separately at solokeys.com

● Robust NFC performance (Near Field Communication). Antenna innovation leading to significantly better NFC performance than the original Solo Tap
● RUST programming language
● PIV(Personal Identification Verification) for advanced and enterprise use cases such as PKCS#11 (e.g. https://github.com/FiloSottile/yubikey-agentunlocks SSH(Secure shell) key use for older versions of OpenSSH that do not support FIDO keys natively)
● PUF-based encrypted storage for all secret material - PUF(Physical Unclonable functions)
● Secure boot with signed firmware upgrades in the field 
● Trussed™ framework allowing easy extensibility with new apps (e.g., Gesellschaft für wissenschaftliche Datenverarbeitung mbH Göttingen is working on an app to store keys for Wireguard VPN)
● Device attestation certificates, ensuring authenticity of devices, usable as root of trust in PIV and other apps.
● OTP(One Time Password) for legacy authentication
● Robust and water resistant. Components placed in an external shell and sealed with a layer of epoxy.

The Fine Print
International Backers
We will ship Solo worldwide. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.
We ship from the US and EU.

Estimated Delivery
We estimate shipping Solo V2 by the end of June 2021.
We have one batch of Solo V2 ready so we estimate shipping to early adopters soon after the campaign ends.
While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. We will provide updates when/if the estimated shipment date changes. At any time up until your Solo has shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing support@solokeys.com.

Need help? We're here for you.
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@solokeys.com.

Risks and challenges
Solo is ready to be manufactured, and we are ready to meet the estimated delivery times. We’ve done our best to predict demand and define a solid production plan. Should we miss any of our projections, we’ll let you know what's happening, why, and correct it as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk
We have already manufactured tens of thousands of security keys, and a few thousands Solo V2. We're confident that our factory can easily scale to hundreds of thousand units. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly resolve the issue.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Launch with the #1 Crowdfunding Agency today
A special thank you to our partners & sponsors
Hear about us on our favorite podcast at the Microsoft Cloud Show, episode 394
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Due to the uncertainty brought about by the pandemic, the shipping dates are estimates. If manufacturing facilities are impacted by lockdown rules then Solo V2 might take ever so slightly longer to get made and shipped.

However, we have been in business for several years, and have a dedicated manufacturing partner with a track record of delivering high quality products on time. Production has already begun and is not expected to slow down any time soon.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Long-lasting design
Made with a unique construction technique that has been developed and perfected by SoloKeys. Components are placed in an external shell and sealed with a layer of epoxy.
Reusability and recyclability
The packaging is 100% paper based and recyclable.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping around end of June! Address change? Update it in your Pledge survey. Solo 2 is now open sourced!
updates.update_content:
Updates for backers
From our last update, we had a bit of a disaster with tooling.  We’ve successfully gotten all the replacement parts (and then some) and our testing provider is back testing NFC chips.  It’s going to be a bit tight, but we’re on schedule to begin shipping at the end of June, prioritizing our Early birds.

Surveys 93% Done!
Nearly all of the surveys have been completed!  There’s still some of you that have either not started it, or not actually completed it.  I just resent the survey to those of you that haven’t completed yet.  So if you just got an email from Pledgebox, please complete the survey!
Our total raised from your additional contributions in Pledgebox is $68,683!  A whopping 18% increase of our Kickstarter funds!  With our Indiegogo, our total raised amount is !

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys 75% complete...and another stretch goal reached!
updates.update_content:
The Good News
We have reached 75% completion of surveys.  But, there are currently 568 surveys in progress...and 852 that haven't even been started yet.  It is important to get these done so we can finalize production numbers.

updates.update_userinfo: Survey update and one more thing!
updates.update_content:
Slight delay on surveys due to required reviews.  A small sampling have been sent out today to ensure functionality.  Pending the results, i.e. it is not confusing and meets the expectations as stated...surveys will go out in the next 48 hours to the other 95% of backers.

By the way...the Limited Edition Solo v2 comes with a Founder's Promise.  If you have the opportunity to encounter one of us at an event, convention or out in town...flash your Limited Edition Solo and if opportunity allows, we will buy you a beer!  Or coffee, water, soda, tea, wine...

updates.update_userinfo: Quick notes on the upcoming survey...and 6000 backers!!
updates.update_content:
6000 backers as the campaign continues on IndieGoGo!
And more great news! We listened to your feedback, re-ran the numbers and decided to remove restrictions on Limited Edition and edit the pricing. 
Everyone can choose to upgrade any key to Limited Edition for a smaller fee than advertised

updates.update_userinfo: It's final, 5831 backers! What happens now?
updates.update_content:
5831 Backers,  $386,771 = awesome support!
The campaign for Solo v2 has tripled the campaign to launch the original SoloKey back in 2019.  We are excited to see Solo v2 come to life as we now turn to preparations to churn out 15000+ keys to deliver to the Kickstarter backers.  And we reached the stretch goal to unlock TOTP!

updates.update_userinfo: Trussed® Announcement - Let the open sourcing begin!
updates.update_content:
Today’s the day: We’re very proud to announce Trussed®, an open source framework for modern cryptographic applications, which powers the FIDO and PIV authenticators of the Bee firmware on the new Solo V2 security key by SoloKeys.
It’s written in Rust.

Quick update  
5000 is a big number...it is greatly appreciated!  TOTP is the next stretch goal at $384,000.  Confident that there will be a strong push during the final 8 days to get there.  Additionally, we have $448k on the table for adding Ed448 to the crypto primitives, building functionality for Solo v2 to grow more widespread support for high security and open primitives.  There is confidence this can be achieved in the next 8 days as well.
Color Selection

We want to share some clarifications on the Limited Edition key.
We caused some confusion that we'd only make a small, fixed number of this keys, which isn't our intent.  We will make however many we need for those that add them as an add-on at end of the campaign -- no limit.  After the campaign is over, we will no longer offer limited edition keys, so only the backers will have had a chance to get them :)

campaign.story:
The classic match up of dwarves vs dragons is now available to 3d print as your own thematic chess set. Will the dwarves be able to reclaim their dwarven halls or will the dragon's reign of terror continue? The matter can only be settled on the chess board!
 Dwarves vs dragons includes the stil files for both a dwarven set of chess pieces and a dragon set of chess pieces. You also get the files to make your own chess board in a variety of styles.

The Dwarven chess pieces 
From left to right; pawn, knight, bishop, prince, king, rook

 The Dragon chess pieces
From left to right; pawn, knight, bishop, queen, king, rook

                    A closer look at the pieces

 The Pawns 

                                   The Knights

                                    The Bishops           
                                     The Rooks

                      The Queen and the Prince
I found myself having difficulty visualising a dwarven queen, so we've got a prince here to fill that role.

                                     The Kings
 The base of each chess piece has a space to allow coins/metal washers to be attached for anyone that wants the chess pieces to feel heavier.



                                  Chess Tiles
The construction of the chess board allows you to chose what types of tiles you'd like, There are five options.
                                  Chess Board
As you may have noticed the chess board has a dwarven theme to it's design. This is my favourite configuration of the tiles.


                                   Broken Tiles
Dragons are heavy creatures and it's not surprising that they would have an impact on their surroundings. If you'd like to reflect this on the chess board there are a multitude of broken and shattered tiles for you to choose from. 

 NZ $1 - What's Happening Here?
Pledging one dollar will keep you up to date with what's going on and make you feel like a terrific person.
Approximately US $0.72, UK £0.53, Euro €0.59

 NZ $20 - Dwarves vs Dragons
 20 NZ dollars will get you the stil files for the Dwarves vs Dragons chess set.
Approximately US $14.44, UK £10.55, Euro €11.88

 NZ $20 - Kings in Conflict
Maybe dwarves and dragons aren't you're thing. You can pledge NZ $20 to get the medieval chess set (and board) along with a wizard set from my previous Kickstarter campaign 'Kings in Conflict'. All unlocked stretch goals from that campaign are included.
Approximately US $14.44, UK £10.55, Euro €11.88
Medieval chess set from left to right; pawn, knight, bishop, queen, king and rook.
Wizard chess set from left to right; pawn, knight, bishop, queen, king and rook. An optional wizard piece included
One of the unlocked stretch goals from this campaign, checker/draught pieces.

For a closer look at this campaign follow the link below:


 NZ $37  - All the Chess Sets
If you'd like both the 'Dwarves vs Dragons' and the 'Kings in Conflict'  this is the pledge level for you.

Approximately US $26.71, UK £19.51, Euro €21.97


 There are no stretch goals for this campaign.

There has been some interest in a dwarven queen piece. Apparently I like to design what my backers want so a queen piece for the dwarves will be available to purchase from Wargame Vault at the conclusion of this campaign. 
Dwarven Queen

There has also been some demand for the magical tile designs from the 'Kings in Conflict' Kickstarter campaign, so that too will be available as an add on from Wargame Vault.  
All files were printed using fdm printers (an Up Box + and an Ender 3 Pro) and used rafts and supports. They were designed using 3ds Max and ZBrush and have been run through a repair tool.

You can try out a test sample of the dragon pawn here:
https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4746584 

Some examples of printed and painted models.

 The chess pieces can be printed as one piece or as two pieces - a top and a base which push fit together. There is also an optional base cap that can be printed but needs to be glued on.

The chess board is comprised of three designs -  the corner, the side and the centre pieces. The chess tiles are slotted in on top of that.
PLAY

For extra rigidity I've glued my board down to a piece of wood.


Fulfillment of 'Dwarves vs Dragons' will be completed through WargameVault. Each backer will receive copies via their account. Fulfillment will begin as soon as possible. This should hopefully be within 2 weeks of the project funding. A survey will be sent out shortly after the project has funded to gather email addresses associated with WargameVault accounts. Please note, this is the only way to gain these files. You will then have the files in your library so you can access them as often as you would like. Any updates to the files will also appear there.


 I've run several Kickstarter campaigns before, all delivered on time.
 My previous campaigns are available to purchase from the WargameVault webstore.

 Or check out my Kickstarter profile page here for a closer look at the campaigns:

 For those interested in licensed printing of these or my other Kickstarter files - allowing you to sell printed copies - here is a link to my patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/foxcraftcreations .
For this license the stl files must be purchased first.
 Keep up to date with this and future projects at www.facebook.com/foxcraftcreations

campaign.story:
UPCOMING PRODUCTION
Now is the perfect time to jump onto this amazing project. After getting preliminary pre-production, costume designs, make-up tests, props, sets completed. We are moving forward with the next steps in the production process. With the help of our supporters, we have enlarged the project to be a full-40-minute show (which is a network hour-long television show).
Set in the near future, Renegades: Ominara is a backdoor pilot/proof of concept, where technology is abundant, space travel is an everyday occurrence, and alien humanoids live among us.
AN ENTREPRENEURIAL PROFESSOR, NAMED STEINER, WANTS TO TAKE TECHNOLOGY TO THE NEXT STAGE OF EVOLUTION – THE MIND. HE HAS DEVELOPED A CHIP THAT WHEN IMPLANTED INTO THE BRAIN WOULD BE ABLE TO CONNECT WITH OTHER “CHIPPED” INDIVIDUALS. THUS ENABLING THE SHARING OF INFORMATION AND THE ABILITY TO COMMUNICATE BOTH SILENTLY AND INSTANTANEOUSLY.
HE REQUIRED TEST SUBJECTS, HOWEVER. SPECIMENS THAT MATCHED THE NEURAL WAVE OUTPUT NEEDED TO APTLY TEST HIS TECHNOLOGY. SUCH TESTING HAD TO BE KEPT SECRET, SO STEINER WAS FORCED TO PICK THROUGH THE DREGS OF SOCIETY AND YET HE WAS LUCKY ENOUGH TO COME ACROSS TWO PEOPLE THAT MATCHED HIS NEEDS PERFECTLY. IF HE WAS SUCCESSFUL, NOT ONLY WOULD HIS ALREADY APT FORTUNE QUADRUPLE, BUT HE WOULD HAVE ACCESS TO THE MINDS OF MILLIONS - UNLOCKING VALUABLE SECRETS. THAT WAS THE REAL PRIZE.
OMINARA
Ominara is a Twenty-year-old girl who has grown up on the streets due to her family disappearing when she was six years old. After escaping from the orphanage, she teamed up with two other strays – Alex and Shane.
We also meet Ominara as an older woman. Her conflict with Steiner has gone on throughout their entire lives with neither besting the other. She becomes the queen of the galactic underworld. The costume pictured here is the one she will wear as a starship captain – an homage to the Mirror, Mirror episode.
Ominara Concept Art vs. Finalized Costume with Star Loren Lott
PROFESSOR ANTON STEINER
Steiner is a man with the ultimate plan. Gaining power not only through wealth and success but by establishing a backdoor into people’s minds. He will be able to extract secrets that can be used in a variety of ways.
We also meet Steiner as an older man. Ominara has become his white whale. His pursuit has cost him dearly over the years to the point of obsession. Yet she continues to elude him. She has gained power in her own right.

SHANE RALLENT
Shane is the youngest of the group, at a mere fifteen years old. Her parents’ deaths were the cause of a car crash that Shane miraculously solely survived. Custody was awarded to her aunt and uncle, but after being abused, she fled to the streets where she met Alex and Ominara.
They instantly became her new family, and she is quick to show them affection. They taught her everything they know about living on the streets, but Shane still likes to be a kid at times, which sometimes gets them into more trouble than usual.
ALEX T'LORN
Alex is a no-nonsense teenager. She’s lived on the streets as long as she could remember. Her mother told her to wait outside of a convenience store and just never came back out. Apparently, she fled through a rear entrance. Essentially Leaving Alex not only homeless but with abandonment issues.
She met and teamed up with Ominara to do quick cons in order to get money for food. Eventually, they took on Shane as a third sister. Once on board their own ship, Alex takes on the second-in-command role.


Adult Ominara will be played by Nichelle Nichols (Star Trek’s Uhura). This will mark Nichelle’s final performance before heading into retirement.
The younger version will be played by Loren Lott of Young & The Restless & American Idol Fame

Prof. Steiner will be played by Walter Koenig(Star Trek’s Chekov). He will play alongside Nichelle for her final scene.
His younger version will be played by Johnny Jay Lee of Station 19 and NCIS: Los Angeles.

Shane is played by Chalet Lizette Brannan of the upcoming peter Pan, land of forever.
The costume pictured is for her position on the ship, keeping with the mirror, mirror homage. We are considering a possible alien look as well.


Alex is played by Jackie R. Jacobson of Netflix’s Malibu Rescue.
The costume pictured here is for her position on the ship, keeping with the mirror, mirror homage. We are considering a possible alien look as well. 
 Reza is the current leader of the underworld. Dolling out jobs and making certain no one undermines his command, Reza is ruthless, but not heartless. After discovering Ominara and her friends, he took them under his wing and taught her how to make crime pay. Little does he know that Ominara's ambition is to take his throne.
Played by Jason Faunt known as the Red Ranger in Power Rangers: Time Force, Mega Force, and Ninja Steel. 
 From Star Trek: Voyager to Spaceballs to the newest season of American Horror Story and Supergirl, Tim Russ is no stranger to the screen. After directing Star Trek: Renegades and Renegades: TheRequiem, he steps back into the director's chair for this new installment featuring Nichelle Nichols in her final performance.
 Tobias is a well-respected member of the film and sci-fi community specifically. Ranging from completing the effects on Renegades to Blade of Honor to Nobility, Tobias and his team are top-notch talents who know how to deliver cinematic excitement.
This project will be Nichelle Nichols final performance before retirement. She will be acting alongside long-time friend and fellow star trek star, Walter Koenig (Chekov).
Nichelle was an innovator in aerospace recruitment, working with NASA for years to recruit women as well as people of color for Nasa’s space programs, including Mae Jemison.
This project is an homage to her previous work.
Renegades: Ominara will mark the third installment in the Renegades saga. It will also be a reimagining of the world with new characters, a new crew, and new villains.
With almost 10 million views, Renegades has garnered a tremendous fan base and we’re excited to bring them the next installment.
Ominara & Steiner

 HOW TO INCREASE YOUR PLEDGE TO INCLUDE AN ADD-ON
1. Click the “manage your pledge” button on the project’s page.
2. Increase your pledge by the amount needed to claim the add-on(s). (May not include shipping.)
3. Save your pledge. Do not change the tier that you originally pledged.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always risks in backing any company. Atomic Studios has released several productions, including Star Trek: Renegades, Renegades: Requiem, and Cozmo's.

We have run assorted Kickstarter campaigns and fulfilled them all successfully and on time, Including the aforementioned board game, novels, and comics.

Production delays may occur but we will do our best to deliver on time.
Some art may be altered upon further development.

Anyone supplying their name for the Thank you page and the on-screen extra pledge is giving us permission to print their name in the book.

Some elements may be beyond our control, such as printing or production delays as well as art taking longer than expected. We will communicate via updates if such delays occur.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: That's right, everyone. We are on a rollercoaster shooting straight upward. We've now unlocked 3 Stretch Goals and on our way to possibly unlocking the 4th. That means that all non-digital donors will receive a Free Underworld patch that will look great on any jacket, knapsack, etc.

Renegades Fans,
It looks like we've unlocked yet another Stretch Goal.  A big thanks to everyone for pushing this forward toward the next level.  We've unlocked the mini-poster that will be included in everyone's pledge. Digitally for the digital pledges and signed by one of the cast members for the non-digital pledges. It is going to look amazing.

Ominara Supporters:
These last few days have been amazing, and it's truly thanks to all of you. We've now unlocked our first Stretch Goal with the next firmly in our crosshairs. That means that everyone will get a full set of collector's cards added to their pledge as long as they have shipping with their pledge.  Digital pledges will get the cards digitally. This is the perfect opportunity to increase your pledge to the DVD or Blu-Ray to get the physical cards.

Hi there, Renegades fans,
If you've been following along, you've seen that not only are we now funded, but we are about to hit our first stretch goal, with hopefully more to come. We are only a little more than $3,000 away.  That's awesome progress in a week and we still have another week to go. Let's keep posting and pushing so we can get you all some FREE STUFF!
Below is a video that includes an interview with producer Frank Zanca about Renegades: Ominara and the making of the production. (Fast Forward to 1 hour in.)

Dear Renegades Ominara Fans-
Thanks to all of you, we will be locking down our shoot dates and getting prepared to shoot. We are currently working on alien designs for the Reza character played by Jason Faunt (Red Power Ranger). As we have more I'll be sharing it. 
It's no time to stop now. Let's start unlocking those stretch goals.

updates.update_userinfo: About to Hit the First Stretch Goal!
updates.update_content:
Hello, Renegades Fans -
Thanks to your continued support of the project the world has taken notice. Hundreds of great media outlets have picked up the story and ran our press release.  Everyone is really excited about the project that you're helping to create. Below are a couple of examples.  You can click on them to follow the links to the articles.
We are now only $10k from the goal and shoot dates are being scheduled. Please keep sharing, posting, and tweeting for us. Just a few more pushes and we'll reach our goal.

All of you have been doing such an amazing job. We've now reached just about 30% of our goal in just a little over 2 days. Of course, that leaves us 70% to go over the next two weeks or so. We appreciate all of your input. We have now added an autograph perk. 
If you have any questions about how to do add-ons or increase your perk level. Here are the instructions.
HOW TO INCREASE YOUR PLEDGE TO INCLUDE AN ADD-ON

campaign.story:
NOZZLES FOR THE FUTURE. READY?
We started out as makers and grew up with the community from the beginning. At first we printed with regular filaments and equipment. But not too long after, we exceeded the boundaries of existing materials: longer operating times, more technical filaments and higher quality expectations demanded the maximum from currently available 3D printer parts - especially the nozzles.
Being engineers by profession we went out to set a new standard for 3D printer nozzles:
 Manufactured according to automotive quality standards 
The best possible industrial materials are used
Extra hard military grade coating
Proudly made in Europe
NEW STANDARD, MORE POSSIBILITIES.
Left: ZODIAC [CRB] series, Right: ZODIAC [PRO] series
QUALITY FIRST
After over a year of hard work, we were able to produce a first small batch of our ZODIAC nozzles. We used these samples to thoroughly evaluate and fine tune them for mass production. A test sell showed great customer feedback and demand for additional types. We now need your support to scale up our production and make these masterpieces available for everyone!
Ultra durable coating allows long service life
Perfect extrusion for extraordinary printing results
Flawless layers even with the most abrasive filaments
Compatible with most common hotends

 TWO SERIES FOR THE WIN
We offer two different product series to respond specifically to your needs. Choose between our [CRB] and [PRO] series depending on your intended usage:
ZODIAC [CRB] SERIES 0.4mm
The ZODIAC [CRB] series has been developed to ensure superior performance and perfect processing of even the most demanding filaments. High-precision manufacturing processes ensure ideal material flows and avoid printing errors. The unique coating enables very high surface qualities and is extremely resistant to abrasion.
ZODIAC [PRO] SERIES 0.4mm
If you are a professional user or operate in an industrial environment, then ZODIAC [PRO] is the right series for you. In order to meet the extreme requirements for continuous professional use, we have improved our nozzle coating even further. Time-consuming tool changes and process errors are reduced to a minimum.

 EXTRAORDINARY PRINTING RESULTS
With ZODIAC nozzles you get outstanding printing results. Thanks to the precise geometry and the unique coating, prints of the highest quality are possible - on a regular base!
What makes ZODIAC special. Right: Printed with ZODIAC [CRB] nozzle
Hi-Res Print with ZODIAC [CRB] Nozzle and PA6-CF
Left: Hi-Res print with ZODIAC [PRO] series and PA6-CF filament, Right: Prusa stock part
Left: FDM part with ZODIAC [PRO] series and PA6-CF, Right: Same part printed with industry level SLS printer.
Printed with ZODIAC [CRB] series nozzle and PLA

NOZZLE COMPARISON
The unique ZODIAC coating is not only exceptionally resistant, but has also very low friction values. This ensures clean material application and avoids unappealing defects in the finished print. Especially highly filled and abrasive materials can be processed perfectly smooth.
Our nozzles are made of high-quality tool steel and can be recycled without restriction.
All our products are developed on a scientific basis. For this purpose, we work closely with academic institutions to improve our nozzles on the basis of meaningful series of measurements.
ZODIAC nozzles have the lowest friction among all existing nozzles.

REWARDS 
After successful financing of the campaign you will receive a questionnaire from us where you can choose from these 6 nozzle types with 0.4mm diameter hole:
 V6 (for E3D hotend familiy: e.g. Prusa printers)
 V6 Volcano (for E3D Volcano hotends)
 MK8 (for Creality printers) 
 M200 (for Zortrax printers)
 V3 (for Raise 3D printers)
 BP1 (for new belt printer systems of Creality, iFactory and many more)
If you choose a package with more than one reward, you can also combine different nozzle types in one shipment. We will ask all supporters for the required nozzle format AFTER the campaign.
WHICH NOZZLE IS COMPATIBLE WITH MY PRINTER?
We've prepared a selection guide to help you select the right nozzle type for your printer. If your printer isn't in the list and you're not sure which type you need, feel free to contact us. Please keep in mind, that we'll ask you AFTER the campaign for the desired type.
Link to ZODIAC compatibility guide: CLICK HERE
Link to ZODIAC datasheets: CLICK HERE

OUR FOUNDING STORY 
My whole working life I used to work in research & development departments for motor sport companies and the armor industry. In 2012 I got into contact with 3D printing and became really passionate about it. I grew up with the early community and their needs – of course their needs became mine as well.
I wanted to use my previous knowledge to implement them in additive manufacturing processes. Growing up with high quality awareness and necessary experience in material science, I started to develop ZODIAC in 2018. The goal was to create the best 3D printing components in the world.
EMIR HAMZIC - Founder
PLEDGE MANAGER
To make the selection of the nozzles as easy as possible for you we have decided to use the proven pledge manager from Backerkit. It helps you to make the right choice and to enter your shipping address. Additionally you have the possibility to add more items to your pledge.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A while ago we did a small pre-production. During this we had good experiences with our suppliers and could optimize the underlying processes. We also did a first test sale and the feedback was very positive. With the current campaign we want to scale up production to make our nozzles accessible to a wider mass of makers.

In summary, we have reliable suppliers, an established quality process and mature products to sell.

Based on this experience, we are convinced to deliver on time and in excellent quality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our products are designed for a particularly long service life: One ZODIAC nozzle replaces up to 12 conventional competitive products!
Reusability and recyclability
ZODIAC nozzles are made of high-quality tool steel and can be recycled without any restriction.
Environmentally friendly factories
We produce and pack in Europe. This avoids long transport routes around the globe and helps reducing our CO2 footprint to a minimum.
Sustainable Distribution
All products are shipped in size optimized packaging. In this way we not only avoid unnecessary packaging waste, but also save valuable space in transit. We prevent the use of plastic packaging wherever possible and instead rely on sustainable alternatives.

campaign.story:
Power comes at a price
Raspberry Pi-4 was welcomed by the Pi enthusiasts for the increased processing power. However, the Pi 4 can draw up to 3 Amps, which means it has to dissipate 15 watts of power. The heat has to be moved away.
From the simplest passive heat sink, through elaborate fan blowers and even to an exotic water-cooled idea, many options are available. While not lacking imagination, all have a common denominator: it is virtually impossible to plug an add on card into the GPIO  expansion header.
All cooling solutions remove access to the GPIO pins
The Smart Fan
The Smart Fan is the most elegant, compact and inexpensive cooling solution for your Raspberry Pi. It passes through all the GPIO pins allowing any number of add-on cards to be stacked on top of Raspberry Pi
The Smart Fan is like eating your cake and saving it too
The Smart Fan installed on top of Raspberry Pi
Smart Fan front and back view
The HAT which lets you use your other HATs
The Smart Fan has the form factor of the Raspberry Pi HAT. Its own tiny 32 bit processor receives commands from Raspberry Pi through the I2C interface. A step-up power supply converts the 5 Volts provided by Raspberry Pi to 12 Volts, ensuring precise speed control. Using pulse width modulation, it powers the fan just enough to maintain a constant temperature of the Raspberry Pi processor.
The Smart Fan Block Diagram
Drawing less than 100 milliamps from the 5 Volt supply, the Smart Fan is whisper quiet. It preserves all the GPIO pins, allowing any number of cards to be stacked on top of Raspberry Pi.
The Smart Fan makes the GPIO connector available for other HATs
True unlimited stackability
If another add-on card has to dissipate power, a secondary Smart Fan can be added to the stack.
Multiple add-on cards with secondary Smart Fan provides supplemental cooling
The fan can be installed on either side of the board. Recommended installation is on the bottom for cooling the Raspberry Pi (Smart Fan on the right side of the picture above) and on the top of PCB for cooling add-on cards (fan on the left side).
The Smart Fan comes with high quality brass mounting hardware - all you need to install it. 
 What's in your kit
The Smart Fan and brass mounting hardware
DIN-Rail Mounting
The optional DIN-Rail kit permits to install the Raspberry Pi on a DIN-Rail. Each kit has two DIN-Rail brackets and supports one Raspberry Pi and one Fan, or two additional add-on cards.
Raspberry Pi and the Smart Fan installed on a DIN-Rail
DIN-Rail kit content
The DIN-Rail kit has two plastic brackets that snap on the rail, two custom steel brackets to attach to the cards, and the required screws to hold the brackets together.
DIN-Rail mounting kit
Software interfaces
The Smart Fan has it's own command system, which can be downloaded from GitHub. You can control it from any program using the built in command line system or from a Python script. A Node Red interface lets you set the processor temperature from the browser. The Smart Fan will implement a PID loop and adjust the fan's speed to keep the processor temperature you specified.
Smart Fan Node-Red Interface

updates.update_userinfo: How to use the Smart Fan
updates.update_content:
How smart the the smart fan? a few people have asked. Actually quite dumb.
But since it can be taught some things, we did not call it the Dumb Fan.
Left by itself, it knows nothing. It cannot cool the Raspberry Pi processor, since it does not know how hot it is. What's worst, it's a slave on the I2C port, so it can do nothing by itself. But it obeys all the proper commands. You have to tell it what to do and it will do it.

updates.update_userinfo: All the rewards shipped on March 30th
updates.update_content:
Although we ordered all the fans six weeks ago, production has been delayed by the Chinese New Year (almost all month of February). This created backlogs in all the assembly factories, and ours was no exception. 
As of today, all the fans have been manufactured and about a quarter have been programmed and tested. We expect to finish testing at the end of this week, and to start shipping next week.

1.  We received the first article of the production run. All components except the fan connector have been moved to the bottom side. The fan will not conflict with any other HAT. The fan can be installed either on the top or on the bottom of the board, depending if it cools Raspberry Pi or another HAT. We will ship it unassembled, you will have to decide the side and install four screws.
2. If you did not do so, please reply to the survey asking for your mailing address.  Please do not enter it in reply to this update, but look for the survey sent by Kickstarter.

We have 2 more days to go and the Smart Fan is flying high. 366 backers pushed up over $17,000.
Two weeks ago we ordered the first production 1,000 kits. 
The PCB's have all been manufactured,  and all the components have been purchased . 
The programming bed is ready, the first articles have been programmed and passed all tests, and we are ready for production.

Alex wrote a Python Proportional-Integral loop to control the processor temperature. We will make it available on GitHub. The target temperature is 50C, displayed every second to the console. The last number is the power ratio to the fan, 0-100% 
pi@raspberrypi:~/SmartFan/python/examples $ python loop.py -t 50 -v
CPU temperature:50 FAN power: 0

This is the command line from Alex's pen. All tested and functional. At the suggestion of a backer we added a conditional stop with sec. parameter. If you use the pushbutton to shut down the Pi, you can leave the fan running for up to 256 seconds, then it turns itself off.

pi@raspberrypi:~/SmartFan$ fan -h
        -v              Display the fan command version number

updates.update_userinfo: Command Line system ready, tomorrow on GitHub
updates.update_content:
Not even one week into our campaign, the Smart Fan is flying high. We are almost 10X subscribed, thank you so much and please tell your friends. We still hope to manufacture before the Great China Shutdown which is their Spring Break, Feb 5th through 21st.
We were ready to release for production, but we looked at what others are doing one more time and decided to add one more feature: a pushbutton. 
Why would anybody want a pushbutton: Simply, to turn off Raspberry Pi when needed. Sure, you can do it from the command line, but most of the time I am too lazy to go there and I simply remove the power.

Hello 22 backers, and many thanks. 

This fan seems to be getting wings, we got funded in 3 hours almost to the minute. As with all our projects, we have prototypes on hand and ready to go, we just need to know how many to order. We plan to order half way through the campaign, about double the number of boards pledged, to be ready to ship as soon as we get your mailing addresses from Kickstarter.

campaign.story:
Welcome to Pack 3!
My name is Louise and I have designed these models for anyone who wants to 3D print some Sci-Fi gaming pieces. I have spent a lot of time modeling these so I hope you enjoy these files.
By pledging to this Kickstarter you will get access to some amazing files that are STL 3D models that are ready to be printed out. These are Sci-Fi themed models that are all ready to be played with for your tabletop games.
Thank you for supporting this campaign and bringing it to success!
Stretch Goals! 
More stretch goals coming soon...
Pack 3 Models
Below you will see all the models that are included in Pack 3. You will get a download link to all of the models in Pack 3 if you pledge for Pack 3 and all the models in Pack 1, 2 and 3 if you pledge for the Bundle pledge level.
Get Pack 1 and 2 as well!
After a successful campaign for Pack 1 and 2 I am now including it here in the Pack 3 campaign as an option to pledge for in the bundle pledge level for those who missed it.
Pack 1
Pack 2
Please note:
All models are optimized for miniatures and can be resized in your slicer software. For slicing we normally use the software Cura.
